data.name: Anime Fantasy Jigsaw Puzzle 3D
data.detailed_description:
Epic naughty puzzles full of charm!
With colorful characters with careful design in a world of medieval fantasy that will not leave you unscathed ...

  • 3D game with the possibility of moving in the environment (360 ° movement) (Possibility of flipping puzzle pieces and rotating)
  • Medieval Fantasy with Stylized Anime Characters
  • 15 Puzzles
  • 5 Extras Puzzles
  • Each puzzle consists of 6, 24, 54, 96 and 150 pieces to choose from!
  • Substantial playing time
  • Medieval Fantasy
  • Soothing and satisfying music
  • 3 Maps between which you can change as you wish.
  • Gallery available in the game

data.short_description: Puzzle game in 3D Epic naughty puzzles full of charm! With colorful characters with careful design in a world of medieval fantasy that will not leave you unscathed ...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit operating system and processor required
  • Processor: Intel Core 3 or equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit operating system and processor required
  • Processor: Intel Core 5 or equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexy Content, Only Partial Nudity Content

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 21.
